oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Runions' store
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interior view of a store owned by B. W. Runions, which was located at N. Church St. B. W. Runions, Griffin L. Rainey, Carter Simpson and Clarence Runions are the men seen standing. Roy Runions, age 3, is seen to the left. A potbelly furnace is in the middle of the room.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Stores & shops; Furnaces
